metadata.title: CVE-2022-1131 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Cast UI in Google Chrome prior to 100.0.4896.60 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
